TEXT.English: Big McDowells is a natural competitor for Burgerworld in areas of fast foods. Both Corporations can be found together often in the same cities. Why? People like to eat at one or the other, or even both.
TEXT.French: Big McDowells is a natural competitor for Burgerworld in areas of fast foods. Both Corporations can be found together often in the same cities. Why? People like to eat at one or the other, or even both.

TEXT.Italian: Big McDowells is a natural competitor for Burgerworld in areas of fast foods. Both Corporations can be found together often in the same cities. Why? People like to eat at one or the other, or even both.
TEXT.Spanish: Big McDowells is a natural competitor for Burgerworld in areas of fast foods. Both Corporations can be found together often in the same cities. Why? People like to eat at one or the other, or even both.

TEXT.English: Your local fast food place to get your hunger on!
TEXT.French: Your local fast food place to get your hunger on!
TEXT.German: Your local fast food place to get your hunger on!
TEXT.Italian: Your local fast food place to get your hunger on!
TEXT.Spanish: Your local fast food place to get your hunger on!

TEXT.English: [TAB]Build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Big McDowells[COLOR_REVERT] Headquarters to create the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Big McDowells Corporation[COLOR_REVERT] which consumes [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cow[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pig[COLOR_REVERT],[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Potato[COLOR_REVERT],[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wheat[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT] and adds a culture bonus to every city where the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Big McDowells Corporation[COLOR_REVERT] is present. The Headquarters provide gold for each city in the world with a Big McDowells franchise.

The Headquarters provide gold for each city in the world with a Big McDowells franchise.
